title: Short title
context: ARTICLE 8. [OLD] INVESTMENT SECURITIES §§490:8-101 to 490:8-408 REPEALED. L 1997, c 33, §1. ARTICLE 8. INVESTMENT SECURITIES PART 1. SHORT TITLE AND GENERAL MATTERS §490:8-101 Short title. This article may be cited as Uniform Commercial Code&ndash;Investment Securities. [L 1997, c 33, pt of §2]
